          <title>
            <string language="sl">Domače branje, basni</string>
            <string language="en">Home reading - fables</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hauptmesswert - Fabeln</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učni list za obravnavo domačega branja ... basni</string>
            <string language="en">Mind map that can be used to check reading comprehension of a home reading - fables.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">basen</string>
            <string language="en">fable</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sinneskarte, die benutzt werden kann, um 
Leseerfassen eines Hauptmesswertes - Fabeln zu überprüfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Carte d'esprit qui peut être employée pour 
contrôler la compréhension de lecture d'une lecture à la maison - 
fables.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapa da mente que pode ser usado verificar a

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di mente che può essere usato per 
controllare la comprensione di una lettura domestica - fables della 
lettura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτης μυαλού που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να 
ελέγξει την κατανόηση ανάγνωσης μιας βασικής ανάγνωσης - μύθοι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Correspondencia de la mente que se puede utilizar
para controlar la comprensión de una lectura casera - fables de la 
lectura.</string>
